title: Clarify/Simplify process for changing availability zone

content.raw:
P6 was unsure if he needed to enter in the keys to change the zone. 

Simple solution: move the explanation text to above the key/zone fields so users read that first. Change to: "Set new AWS credentials and zone. Your keys are required to change the zone. Changes will be applied to new constellations."

More complicated: auto-detect the availability zone OR don't require the keys to change the zone (this will require a minor reorganization of that section of the  UI)

Related to #98
